ygData.subject: Re: The madness explained!
ygData.msgSnippet: i guess i need to start using [sarcasm][/sarcasm] tags. like this. [sarcasm type= brad comment style= silly ] The no drop stat change is intentional, to
ygData.messageBody:
i guess i need to start using [sarcasm][/sarcasm] tags. like this.

[sarcasm type="brad comment" style="silly"]"The no drop stat change is
intentional, to balance the power of the armor." - Brad[/sarcasm]

was a JOKE!

hence the "good impression?" line immediately after it.

kg
